title: Danilo Perez - Across The Crystal Sea
description:
Across The Crystal Sea 
Danilo Perez 

Label 	Emarcy
Orig Year 	2008
Release Date 	Aug 26, 2008
Producer 	Tommy LiPuma

Personnel 	

Christian McBride - bass instrument
Lewis Nash - drum
Cassandra Wilson - vocals
Danilo Perez - piano
Luis Quintero - percussion
Bruce Dukov - concert master

Orchestra arranged and conducted by Claus Ogerman

5.	If I Forget You

7.	Saga of Rita Joe, The
8.	Another Autumn
